Name: Infra.Market
Short Description: Infra.Market is a B2B e-commerce platform that focuses on streamlining the construction materials supply chain through tech innovation.
Description: Infra.Market is a construction solutions company that creates a multi-product building materials brand, they are transforming the ecosystem through leveraging technology and scaling innovation. Infra.Market offers a wide range of construction materials, including cement, steel, chemicals, and more, catering to various needs within the construction industry. The platform is a one-stop shop for construction materials, leveraging technology to simplify procurement and logistics.

Name: IndiaMART
Short Description: IndiaMART.com is an online B2B marketplace connecting buyers with suppliers.
Description:
IndiaMART is an online B2B marketplace, connecting buyers with suppliers. The online channel focuses on providing a platform to SMEs, large enterprises as well as individuals. 
Founded in 1996, the company’s mission is ‘to make doing business easy’.

5.98 Crore+ Buyers | 47 Lakh+ Suppliers | 5 Crore+ Products

IndiaMART for Buyers
-	Convenience of connecting with sellers anytime, anywhere
-	Wider marketplace with a range of products and suppliers
-	One-stop-shop for all requirements

IndiaMART for Suppliers
-	Enhanced business visibility
-	Access to buyers from across the globe
-	Increased credibility for your brand

IndiaMART has over 3600 employees located across 80+ offices in the country, and with customers spanning across 200 nations. Its existing investors include Intel Capital, Amadeus Capital, WestBridge Capital & Quona Capital.

Name: EaseMyTrip.com
Short Description: EaseMyTrip is an online travel portal that offers best deals on flight booking, hotels and holiday packages.
Description: Easy Trip Planners Pvt. Ltd. (EaseMyTrip.com) is an online travel company of India that is based in Patparganj Industrial Area, New Delhi. This travel company is having its branch offices in various cities of India and overseas. The brainchild of Pitti brothers (Mr. Nishant Pitti and Mr. Rikant Pitti), EaseMyTrip was founded by them in year 2008. It deals in flight tickets, hotel reservations, car rentals, bus booking and holiday packages. The travel agency uses Computer Reservation System like Galileo or sometimes it also books tickets directly from the airlines. For hotels and cars, it provides offline as well as online booking. The company has its overseas branches at places like Bangkok, Singapore, Dubai and Maldives. It is currently having a B2B network of 50,000 Travel agents, 1200 Franchise Outlets, 1800 Corporate Clients, 1600 Distributors, and 640 Whitelabel solutions.

Name: Medikabazaar
Short Description: Medikabazaar is an online B2B marketspace for medical supplies and equipment.
Description:
Medikabazaar is an online B2B marketspace for medical supplies and equipment. The company is a single point of contact for all product-based needs, enabling medical institutions and individual practitioners alike to cut down on operational costs and making the best global brands available locally, all aided with the miracle that goes by the name of technology. 

Medikabazaar is connected with more than 50,000 medical establishments, 1,50,000 Independent Practitioners, and have partnered with 13,000+ suppliers all over India including ones in Tier 2, Tier 3 cities, and remoter locations to establish a strong foothold in India.

With the power of technology, Medikabazaar organized a haywire market in a country with perhaps the largest and most complex geographical structure in the world for this purpose. Medikabazaar's last-mile delivery system and 26 strategically placed Fulfilment Centers across India enable the company to deliver essential medical supplies to healthcare facilities and help them nurture quality and timely patient care.

Name: Dice
Short Description: Dice is redefining SaaS to "Spending as a Service" & pushing India's most Holistic Spend Management Ecosystem for corporates & enterprises.
Description:
At Dice, we are disrupting the way enterprises consume B2B goods and services, and manages corporate spend. We are redoing what SaaS stands for in a corporate setup - Spending as a Service.

The modern corporate spending & consumption marketplace, built over unique UPI & banking architecture, integrates digital consumption APIs & B2B marketplaces with a no-code approval workflow. This enables all types of employee discretionary spend scenarios like commute, hotels, etc, and corporate spend scenarios like PO and Non-PO based vendor spend, through a single in-app open partner platform. 

No more cash. No more cards. No more reimbursements. No more offline invoices. 

Dice's super-app is used by more than 50,000 users pan-India, providing greater visibility into and control over how enterprises spend money, driving significant cost savings and profitability.

Name: HungerBox
Short Description: HungerBox is a full-stack B2B food and beverage technology company that provides food solutions for corporate.
Description:
HungerBox is a full-stack B2B food and beverage technology company that provides food solutions for corporate. It provides an online platform that allows employees to order food and get delivery service for office and corporate events from the cafeteria.

HungerBox aims to enhance the productivity of corporate employees by providing them a technology-driven food experience that is safe and healthy. It was founded in 2015 by Sandipan Mitra and Uttam Kumar and is based in Bangalore, India.

Name: Zyod
Short Description: Zyod is a startup that provides apparel sourcing and manufacturing to fashion brands globally.
Description: Zyod is a startup that provides apparel sourcing and manufacturing to fashion brands globally. It is a B2B marketplace that offers fashion brands end-to-end design-to-delivery solutions with the industry's fastest turnaround time and lowest MOQs.

Name: NirogStreet
Short Description: NirogStreet is a B2B tech enabled and doctor led platform to mainstream Ayurveda
Description: NirogStreet is a technology-enabled and doctor-led community commerce platform to streamline the supply chain of Ayurvedic services and medicine so that doctors are able to deliver better healthcare to their patients.

Name: Clodura.AI
Short Description: Your GenAI powered sales co-pilot, from prospecting to closing with Database, Sales Engagement, Email Verification, Buyer Intent and more.
Description:
Clodura is an AI-powered lead generation platform. It helps you generate highly targeted sales-qualified leads. You get unlimited access to clean B2B prospect data of more than 600 million contacts & 46 million companies. With more than 120 million direct dial numbers, it gives you the power to reach out to your prospects faster. Clodura's actionable sales intelligence triggers and automated sales cadence help you book more qualified meetings and grow revenue faster. Winning sales teams worldwide use Clodura to target their Total Addressable Market and accelerate their sales effectively.

In Clodura.AI's Org Chart feature, the sales teams can accurately identify and target key decision-makers within an organization. The Org Chart feature enables the sales and marketing teams to create focused and effective sales and marketing campaigns. Knowing the prospect better inevitably results in closing deals faster and more effectively. Clodura.AI provides a comprehensive calling feature that integrates with users' CRM and adds tasks and follow-ups. Tracking leads and strategizing the next step with actionable insights at one's disposal is seamlessly incorporated into Clodura's platform. Clodura.AI also provides 95% accuracy on emails and direct-dials whose database is frequently updated. Users can connect to their leads effortlessly within minutes, thus saving endless time reaching the appropriate contacts. With Clodura.AI, users get technographic information about companies, including installing base intelligence for 15,000+ technologies, allowing them to map customers' tech landscape to their offerings.

Specialties - Verified emails & direct dial numbers, Real-Time sales intelligence, Automated sales sequences. Org Charts, Qwikmail

Start your free trial at  https://www.clodura.ai/app/#/auth/register
Book A Demo at https://www.clodura.ai/request-demo/

Name: Shopkirana
Short Description: Shopkirana is a supply chain company that develops B2B e-commerce platforms and focuses on supply chain technology.
Description:
Shopkirana is a B2B-commerce company that focuses on technology and supply chain innovation. It aims to encourage retailers to be competitive by delivering technology, operational expertise, and scale advantage.

The company directly works with brands to boost them on the demand side and reach to masses with transparency and deep market intelligence.

Shopkirana was founded on 2015 and is headquartered in Indore, India.

Name: SOLV
Short Description: SOLV is a B2B e-commerce marketplace for MSMEs that facilitates commerce in a digital environment.
Description:
SOLV is a B2B e-commerce marketplace for MSMEs. The SOLV platform facilitates commerce in a trusted environment while easing access to finance and business services through one seamless digital experience. MSMEs on the SOLV platform can discover, connect, and do business with other verified buyers and sellers and take advantage of on-demand working capital & term loans, and business services. SOLV is digitizing India’s physical B2B supply chains and creating a Digital Trust Model for the MSME ecosystem. This is enabled by a robust e-commerce platform powered by AI & ML technology, backed by an end-to-end fulfillment infrastructure. SOLV’s proprietary trust score, the SOLV Score, helps MSMEs establish credibility online and also aids in credit decisions.

The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bangalore, Karnataka, India.

Name: Fisdom
Short Description: Fisdom is a leading wealth-tech platform offering a holistic range of financial products to retail & mass affluent customers in India.
Description:
Fisdom is a leading digital wealth platform that offers a comprehensive range of financial products and services to retail and mass affluent customers in India. We offer a holistic set of financial products including listed stocks, mutual funds, pension funds, sovereign bonds, insurance, and taxation, making it a one-stop-shop for all financial needs.

We have innovated the wealthtech industry in India by pioneering the B2B2C distribution model through strategic partnerships with 15 leading banks in the country. This gives us exclusive access to a customer base of more than 400 million.

Our platform, through SDKs, is seamlessly integrated into the mobile banking apps of our partner banks, providing customers with a seamless and convenient experience. Additionally, our access to over 20,000 bank branches across India allows for a hybrid distribution model, providing customers with both digital and assisted options.

We have an active customer base of 1.2 million with 76% of our customers coming from tier 2 and tier 3 locations in India. We are proud to have partnered with some of the most reputable banks in the country, including Indian Bank, UCO Bank, and Union Bank of India among others.

Our success has been recognized by some of the most prestigious awards in the industry, including "Best Fintech Company" for FY20 & FY21 at Financial Express Best Banks Awards and "Best Financial Services Partner 2022" by FICCI and Indian Banks’ Association.

Name: Rupifi
Short Description: Rupifi is a digital B2B platform that offers loans, working capital, and payment services to small businesses.
Description: Rupifi is a digital B2B platform that offers loans, working capital, and payment services to small businesses. The company was founded in 2020 by Ankit Singh, Anubhav Jain, and Jawaid Iqbal and is headquartered in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India.

Name: Bijak
Short Description: Bijak is a developer of B2B platform for agricultural commodities positioned towards MSME buyers and sellers
Description: Bijak is a developer of B2B platform for agricultural commodities that gives buyers and sellers better prices, increased working capital and optimized logistics. Bijak is a business-to-business trade platform for the agricultural sector in India that enables traders, wholesalers, and food processors to keep a ledger of their transactions, access transparent pricing, optimize logistics, and improve their working capital cycles.

Name: Captain Fresh
Short Description: Captain Fresh operates a fish and seafood supply chain platform to deliver a fast harvest-to-retail service.
Description:
Captain Fresh is a freshwater fish and seafood supply chain platform. Captain Fresh is a B2B marketplace leveraging technology to deliver the fastest harvest-to-retail in the industry. The company focuses on aggregating the fragmented retail demand across the country and linking them to the small fishermen and farmers throughout the Indian coast.

The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

Name: NovaVente
Short Description: NovaVente is a consulting firm that offers sales, marketing, managed services, technology sales, and B2B Sales.

Name: Loadshare Networks
Short Description: Loadshare Network  provides logistical software solutions focusing on first-mile, line-haul, and last-mile delivery services.
Description:
Loadshare Networks provides the technology platform, operations know-how, besides providing guidance on business development and branding. It also offers other services, ranging from first-mile, line-haul, and last-mile deliveries to modular logistics software solutions.

The services offered by Loadshare Networks Pvt. Ltd. range from first-mile, line-haul, last-mile deliveries, and modular logistics software solution to partners. It is primarily focussed on business-to-consumer (B2C) logistics and has plans to foray into B2B logistics.

Name: Data Sutram
Short Description: Answers on Smart Growth
Description:
An interactive B2B SaaS for marketing, sales and risk professionals. Answering questions on GTM, acquisition, risk, collections and more. With our proprietary tech, new age design and of course data and insights, like never before.

Now don’t solve for growth. Solve for hypergrowth

Name: dyte
Short Description: Dyte is a video infra as a service provider focusing on video and audio integrations.
Description:
Dyte is a live video API that helps developers add real-time communications using video and audio to their apps and platforms. Dyte's low code approach and user-friendly documentation allows users to go live with less lines of code. It supports use cases such as live classes, telehealth, online fitness, remote work, social meetups, dating, and B2B sales.

It was founded in 2020 in India and is backed by Y Combinator.

Name: Agrim Wholesale
Short Description: Agrim Wholesale is a b2b e-commerce market for manufacturers and retailers.
Description: Agrim creates a B2B commerce marketplace app for Agri-Inputs, bringing retailers and manufacturers together on a single platform. It aims to connect 40K+ small to large size manufacturers with the large and loyal retailer network and improve the supply chain by enabling 1M+ Agri-input retailers to discover superior quality products at the right price and on-time delivery.

Name: Everest Fleet
Short Description: Everest Fleet is a fleet management company offering B2B sustainable mobility solutions.
Description: Everest Fleet is a fleet management company offering B2B sustainable mobility solutions. In India, Everest Fleet operates in the shared mobility industry. It presently supplies over 6000 automobiles to taxi aggregation platforms in seven major cities. Everest Fleet has a 100% CNG fleet of vehicles and is constantly expanding across India.

Name: DevX
Short Description: DevX is a co-working accelerator with a focus on spaces & innovation.
Description: DevX manages a co-working cum Accelerator. It intends to invest in businesses, healthcare, artificial intelligence and machine learning, the internet of things, cloud tech and devops, e-commerce, fintech, mobility tech, micro mobility, B2B payments, and SaaS startups.

Name: Upswing Financial Technologies
Short Description: Upswing Financial Technologies is an open finance B2B ecosystem enabler.
Description: Upswing Financial Technologies is an open finance B2B ecosystem enabler.

Name: Scimplifi
Short Description: Scimplifi is a B2B fulfilment platform that provides customized solutions for sourcing and manufacturing of innovative chemistries.
Description: Scimplifi is a B2B fulfilment platform that provides customized solutions for sourcing and manufacturing of innovative chemistries.

Name: Geniemode
Short Description: Geniemode is a B2B cross-border sourcing and supply chain startup.
Description: Geniemode develops a B2B cross-border sourcing and supply chain platform. It focuses on transforming global sourcing for retailers & brands in the furniture, hard goods & fashion industry using technology.

Name: Veefin Solutions
Short Description: Veefin is an agile, flexible and integrated software solution for supply chain financing services
Description:
Veefin Solutions is based in Mumbai and is one of the world’s leading Supply Chain Finance Technology Solutions providers with a global clientele that includes Financial Institutions, B2B Marketplaces and Fintechs.

Veefin’s out-of-the-box SCF solution has a full-stack platform offering: 

1) Anchor/Vendor/Dealer Onboarding. 
2) Multi-facility Underwriting.
3) Transaction/loan management.
4) Delinquency Management.


Across the entire range of SCF products including Deep Tier Vendor financing. It is accessible on the web and through mobile apps for all participants in the value chain. It is ready-to-deploy with rich configurability and modular architecture to accommodate complex arrangements between parties involved. Veefin has the fastest implementation time in the industry. 

Veefin’s platform is priced on a SaaS subscription model and can be deployed on the cloud or on-prem as per client requirements.

Name: VenWiz
Short Description: Venwiz is a digital platform that facilitates the procurement of services in the manufacturing industry for both CapEx and MRO requirements.
Description: VenWiz is building an online B2B platform for manufacturers and skilled service vendors to partner and prosper together. While B2B services are core to the manufacturing industry; the discovery, procurement, and execution of these services in India have stayed underserved by digitization. They provide end-to-end digital solutions to its manufacturing clients to ensure a seamless procurement experience. The platform's cutting-edge digital tools optimize the procurement lifecycle for businesses. They digitize post-PO milestone management, allowing for on-time project completion.

Name: ibibo Group
Short Description: ibibo Group is an Indian online travel group that operates web properties, including an B2C online travel aggregator and more.
Description:
ibiboGroup is an Indian online travel group that owns properties such as Goibibo.com, a B2C online travel aggregator; redBus.in, an online bus ticketing platform; and travelboutique, a B2B online travel platform.

In 2010, ibiboGroup organically developed and launched Goibibo.com that enables consumers to buy air tickets, hotels, and bus tickets via both mobile and desktop. It has become a mobile and online travel platform in India for bookings, after sales, payments, and refunds. The combined travel assets of ibiboGroup makes the company one of the largest in terms of volume of transactions.

ibiboGroup was founded in 2006 by [Ashish Kashyap](https://www.crunchbase.com/person/ashish-kashyap) and the company also owns a minority stake in Naspers’ global payments business, PayU Global. It is headquartered in Gurgaon, India.

Name: Get My Parking
Short Description: Get My Parking, is a B2B Platform-as-a-Service company.
Description:
Get My Parking, is a B2B Platform-as-a-Service company. 
GMP's inter-operable open IoT Platform is designed to connect different types of parking inventory together on to a digital layer, making it future ready to meet changing mobility needs. Working across 16 countries, Platform connects with different make and type of parking infrastructure, giving complete visibility and control the Parking Operator/ City Council. Platform exploits synergies with various demand aggregators like mapping services, Auto OEMs, Corporate clients and Fleet Companies.

Name: Devnagri
Short Description: Devnagri is an AI-powered Translation Platform translating the content in Indian Languages using automation, delivering solutions to B2B
Description: Devnagri is an AI-powered translation platform translating the content in Indian Languages using automation system. The company has has built in B2B solutions to deliver Scalability solutions to businesses reaching next Billion Internet users in their regional languages. Devnagri combines Neural Machine Translation with machine learning to build contextual results. Their APIs are scalable & Optimised and can be implemented to any websites / Mobils Apps to take the content into any Indigenous Languages real time. Devnagri is also empowered by SaaS model which enable their customers to play around with the translated content on the go.

Name: Skolar
Short Description: E-learning, upskilling, LMS
Description:
Skolar’s story began around March 2020, when the 2 founders came together to begin a platform that would help students prepare and crack various company/university exams and interviews. After talking to students to truly understand what they felt was lacking in their training, customised training models in a B2B structure was implemented to bridge the gap between classroom and industry.

Over time, Skolar has ventured into other services such as providing technology-based backbones and solutions to start-up's, digital marketing for upcoming brands to establish an online presence and help companies manage their workforce.

This is just the beginning of our story, we aim to keep growing ourselves and the community in the years ahead.

Name: Holisol Logistics Pvt. Ltd.
Short Description: Holisol Logistics is a leading 3PL logistics company that offers multi-channel fulfillment solutions for B2C and B2B businesses.
Description: HoliSol Logistics is a leading 3PL logistics company and exchange-to-exchange tech-enabled supply chain solutions company that offers multi-channel fulfillment solutions for B2C and B2B businesses. It offers multi-channel fulfillment solutions for B2C and B2B businesses spanning across retail, fashion, lifestyle, FMCG, online marketplaces, and auto industries. It also provides integrated packaging, logistics, and returnable solutions to automobile, farm equipment, and heavy engineering businesses.

Name: Kodo
Short Description: Kodo is a fintech startup focused on serving the corporate card and B2B payments needs of small businesses.
Description:
Kodo is a fintech startup focused on serving the corporate card and B2B payments needs of small businesses. The company offers credit cards for startups. It can be used for services such as business expenses, money transfers, online/offline purchases, and more.

Kodo was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra.

Name: RP tech India
Short Description: RP tech India is a computer software company that provides enterprise solutions, B2B, and networking solutions.

Name: MyMandi
Short Description: MyMandi is a B2B2C marketplace that provides a one-stop shop, an online platform and other value added services to cart pushers.
Description: MyMandi is a B2B2C marketplace that provides an online platform and other value-added services for the cart-pusher community. MyMandi aggregates and supports India's last-mile delivery network, which enables a pick-and-choose model by bringing the market to customers' doorsteps.

Name: Nova Benefits
Short Description: Nova Benefits is an employee wellness platform that offers health insurance plans for employees and their families.
Description: Nova Benefits operates as a B2B health insurance platform. Nova Benefits is an employee benefits platform centered around corporate health insurance. It helps save HR time by eliminating manual workflows.

Name: EnKash
Short Description: EnKash is comprehensive business spend management & cards platform that helps in optimizing their cashflows and spending.
Description:
EnKash is an all-in-one comprehensive commercial payments platform. Growing number of next gen businesses have trusted EnKash for frictionless payments experience. EnKash is one of the fastest growing platforms in the B2B space, enabling businesses to digitize and simplify their commercial payments.

EnKash has been able to create unique value with the combination of platform and cards. Businesses now can have much desired convenience, savings, control and visibility to improve business productivity and operational efficiencies.

EnKash is leading innovations by enabling simple and technological advance solutions. With state-of-the-art technology, EnKash is committed to help businesses in their cash flow management challenges.

Starting its journey in mid-2017 and becoming operational in early 2018, EnKash is able to disrupt commercial payments and cards space in a very short span of time.

EnKash is based out of India, with its offices present across Mumbai, Delhi-NCR, Pune and Bengaluru.

Name: StackBOX
Short Description: StackBOX is a technology company that provides B2B distribution services to grocery stores.
Description:
StackBOX is a technology company that provides B2B distribution services to grocery stores.  Through their distribution technology, they are able to help FMCG companies, brands, distributors, wholesalers, cash and carry retailers distribute their products to millions of grocery stores in the most efficient way.

The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Bengaluru, India.

Name: Rubix Data Sciences
Short Description: Rubix Data Sciences is a technology and analytics-based B2B risk management and monitoring platform.
Description: Rubix Data Sciences Pvt. Ltd. helps you to take prudent credit risks, build a robust supply chain and monitor compliance for your business partners in India and around the world. Rubix helps you collect payments in time from your debtors, helping generate predictable cash flows. Rubix has been appointed as Validation Agent for the Legal Entity Identifier by Legal Entity Identifier India Ltd, the Local Operating Unit accredited by Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation (GLEIF).

Name: AntWalk
Short Description: AntWalk is a B2B Ed-Tech platform that helps offers employee up-skilling programmes and services.
Description:
AntWalk is a video platform that equips professionals with learning and skills. Its up-skilling programs are delivered by top industry leaders and customized to meet the needs of ever-evolving organizations. Its platform is powered by 3,000+ Experts from 500+ Global Brands to provide professionals with an arsenal of Short Knowledge Bytes, Live Group Classes, and 1:1 Interactions with Experts. These enable them to learn in the flow of work, develop a growth mindset and propel their career to the next level.

The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bangalore, Karnataka, India.

Name: Pharmarack
Short Description: Pharmarack is the largest B2B healthcare network in India.
Description:
Pharmarack is India’s largest integrated B2B Healthcare platform – combining Technology, Analytics, Logistics, Supply Chain & Financing. An ecosystem partner for Pharmaceutical and Consumer Health companies, Distributors, Retailers, Hospitals and Public Health enterprises, we help deliver significant and sustainable advantage by improving efficiencies, reducing costs, driving revenue growth and increasing overall market visibility. 
Poised to transform the highly fragmented Indian Pharmaceutical Market, Pharmarack empowers better decision making by:
Improving sales team performance with automation tools
Optimizing resources and reducing operational costs by creating symbiotic networks
Generating daily live actionable insights through most granular information available in India
Running highly targeted Digital and On-ground marketing campaigns with a captive audience
Maximizing customer value with rapid digital transformation 
Driving meaningful change in Public Health sector with AI backed insights
As the productivity imperative in healthcare looms ever larger, Pharmarack allows companies to improve their processes and leverage granular information driven insights to their advantage with its end-to-end connected marketplace offering.
With our easy to use interface and versatile plugins, Pharmarack is the preferred partner of over 200,000 retailers pan India!
Pharmarack has presence in over 70 cities with offices in Mumbai and Pune, India and is led by a team of industry veterans who help drive Pharmarack’s mission to disrupt the healthcare space by leveraging big data.  
For more information, visit our website https://www.pharmarack.com/

Name: Finhaat
Short Description: Finhaat is a distribution platform for financial services catering to the emerging middle class and individuals with lower incomes.
Description: Finhaat is a distribution platform for financial services catering to the emerging middle class and individuals with lower incomes. The company's B2B platform for distributing and servicing insurance is targeting non-banking financial companies, cooperatives, non-governmental organizations, and other institutions focused on serving the underserved.

Name: WalMart India
Short Description: Wal-Mart India owns and operates 28 B2B modern wholesale stores under brand name 'Best Price'.
Description:
Wal-Mart India Private Limited is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Walmart Stores Inc. owns and operates 28 B2B Modern Wholesale Stores under the brand name of `Best Price’. The company also operates 2 Fulfillment Centres in India.

The Best Price stores offer competitive prices with unmatched convenience, choice, quality, and hygiene. The mission of Best Price is "Enabling businesses to prosper…every single member”. To enter and purchase from Best Price stores, it is mandatory to become a member. Members can belong to different business categories such as Resellers (Kirana Store owners); Offices and Institutions; and Hotels, Restaurants, and Caterers.

Members get the benefits of a wide range of product assortment to suit their needs at competitive, consistent, and transparent prices, great shopping experience, and convenient payment and delivery solutions. The price structure allows profitability to the members and also allows them to pass on the price savings to the end-customers, thereby helping them to save money and live better. The assortment, service, and store layout are customized to the specific needs of members who can walk into a Best Price store and source high-quality products in quantities they need and at the time they require.

Name: Just Deliveries(JD)
Short Description: Intra city logistics solutions for perishables, creating the supply chain backbone for frozen, chilled & fresh food items.
Description: "B2B LOGISTICS" "INTRA-CITY LOGISTICS" "COLD CHAIN" "SUPPLY CHAIN" "PERISHABLES"

Name: NewsBytes
Short Description: NewsBytes is India's only media-technology leveraging AI-powered engine to create content in multiple languages across formats.
Description:
NewsBytes is India’s only media technology company that has the ability to create content, in multiple languages, using an AI-powered engine. At NewsBytes, we are solving the biggest problem engulfing the media market: producing good quality content, across media formats, with minimal human intervention. 

NewsBytes is an amalgamation of two companies, one consumer-facing media platform leveraging the content engine to produce content and the other a B2B technology company helping companies to create content by licensing its technology.

Name: Starbuzz.ai
Short Description: Starbuzz.ai is a B2B SaaS that automates influencer marketing for marketers
Description: Starbuzz is a MarTech SaaS platform where Brands and Influencers can discover, connect, and collaborate effortlessly. Our proprietary algorithms (using 70 data points) aim at making Influencer Marketing seamless and efficient, by saving time and giving meaningful and in-depth reports.

Name: Finayo
Short Description: Finayo Lending-as-a-Service (FLaaS) is an advanced B2B LaaS technology Platform for lending business transformation.

Name: ShipEase Technologies
Short Description: ShipEase Technologies is a logistics company that offers transportation, supply chain, and storage services.
Description: ShipEase Technologies provides b2c and b2b shipping, ndr management tool, hassle free remittance, courier selection, marketplace integration, sms and e-mail notification, and intelligent courier selection services.

Name: IGP
Short Description: IGP is India’s largest online gifting store offering curated gifts, cakes/flowers & personalized products for all occasions & festivals.
Description:
IGP is India's largest Direct to Consumer (D2C) platform for occasions and IGP for Business is a leading B2B2C partner for reward management and corporate gifting. The Company sells personalized, floral, gourmet and handmade products. 

IGP was founded in 2016 by technology entrepreneur Tarun Joshi and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

Name: Anar
Short Description: Anar is a B2B business network helping SMBs in India grow.
Description: Anar helps small and medium business (SMB) communities build their network online and offline, providing access to new products, current market trends, and knowledge to innovate their venture into the broader market.

Name: MyWays.ai
Short Description: MyWays.ai is an AI based Job-Tech Platform establishing customized hiring and training ecosystem for the corporates
Description: MyWays is a B2B Job-Tech venture, backed by CIIE.CO IIM Ahmedabad and Wami Capital. We are an AI platform providing a customized end-to-end, Zero Effort hiring, and training ecosystem for corporates. We help onboard and train entry-level techies tailored to the needs of the employers such that the fresh candidates are ready to assume their new roles as "Experienced Freshers" as quickly as possible, leading to lowering efforts and costs and increasing retention.

Name: The Dollar Business
Short Description: TheDollarBusiness.com (TDB) is India’s First B2B foreign trade platform for exporters & SMEs.
Description:
TDB is a Technology platform for exporters, importers & SMEs which enable them identify and get access to right export markets & Buyers. 
EXIMAPS - The most powerful buyer discovery and competitor analysis tool for Indian exporters and manufacturers. Gain unlimited access to 2.4 million buyer and seller company profiles from across 181 Countries.

Name: pumpumpum
Short Description: PumPumPum is a pre-owned car subscription service offering an affordable and convenient solution to car ownership.
Description: PumPumPum is a pre-owned car subscription service offering an affordable and convenient solution to car ownership. Users can select a pre-owned car of their choice, without worrying about the price, financing, warranty, quality & depreciation of the car. The company is building a risk-free and high-quality pre-owned car portfolio for financial partners via the B2B2C approach.

Name: Locofast
Short Description: A B2B online marketplace for textile procurement.
Description:
Locofast is the fastest-growing B2B textile marketplace, leveraging technology to the core of transaction enabling smart, efficient and sustainable fabric sourcing solutions to businesses around the world.

In a span of two years, the company has raised two rounds of funding, most recently being Series B financing. The company is backed by Chiratae Ventures and Axilor Ventures.

The company is headquartered in New Delhi, with offices pan-India and Bangladesh.

Name: Easebuzz
Short Description: Easebuzz is a software platform that allows B2B companies and start-ups to become fintechs and grow their enterprises.
Description:
Easebuzz is an ecommerce company. It offers a platform that enables its user to buy or sell products with a free online store and an easy to use payment solution. The company allows its users to sell events, physical items, digital items, and services. It also allows them to promote their products and collect payments through the company’s payment solution. 

Additionally, the company enables its users to create webstores to sell multiple products. It provides payment APIs for user’s website that can integrate on any platform. Easebuzz was founded by Rohit Prasad in 2015.

Name: Yojak
Short Description: India's first B2B Onilne Marketplace for building materials
Description: We at Yojak are building India’s first B2B managed marketplace for finishing building materials, that helps retailers and manufacturers increase their business. Our long term vision is to build the whole ecosystem for building materials catering to global demand through a global footprint of supply.

Name: Etrav
Short Description: eTrav Tech Private Limited is a B2B Travel Tech website offering Flight API, Holiday Packages, Hotel API, Bus API, and Visa services.
Description: eTrav Tech Private Limited operates as a B2B Travel Tech website. The company offers a range of services including Flight API, Holiday Packages, Hotel API, White Label/XML, Bus API, and Visa services. eTrav's Flight API serves Online Travel Agencies (OTAs), Tour Operators (TOs), Online Booking Tools (OBTs), Meta-search, and Travel Management. The company also caters to B2C Travel Agency needs. eTrav's services are designed to help reduce workload for customers through investment in training and technology.

Name: Covvalent
Short Description: Covvalent is B2B cross-border commerce for specialty chemicals industry.
Description: Covvalent is a B2B cross-border commerce that provides tech-enabled solutions for the reliable supply chain of the specialty chemicals industry. Covvalent offer a range of pigments, resins, additives, binders, and polymers across various industries

Name: Supplynote
Short Description: Supplynote is a procurement platform with a unique stack of SAAS and E-commerce to solve the procurement problem.
Description: Supplynote is a pioneering B2B platform in the food and beverage industry, founded with the mission to streamline and digitalize the supply chain management process for food businesses. We are committed to simplifying procurement by connecting restaurant owners and suppliers, ensuring transparency, efficiency, and cost-effectiveness. By offering solutions including automated purchasing, vendor management, and real-time inventory tracking, we empower businesses to focus more on their core competencies. Since our inception, we've been continuously innovating, driven by a passion for revolutionizing the food industry's logistics and inventory management dynamics.

Name: Practically
Short Description: Practically is India’s first experiential learning app designed to make learning immersive for students of classes 6-12
Description:
Practically is India’s first experiential learning app designed to make learning immersive for students of classes 6-12. Practically is the only such product in the world that combines game engine, innovative features, and AI-assisted study buddy, all in one compact cross-platform app. We offer a comprehensive library of 3000+ world-class 3D videos, 1000+ AR experiences & Simulations. We are the world’s first EdTech company to launch the revolutionary #ScanAnything feature. We also offer Live classes, Dedicated mentor support, Study Plan, Test Prep and Coding++ course along with an AI Study Buddy Proton, 24×7 Seek Help feature for doubt resolution.

The Practically School Solution, our B2B2C offering gives schools and teachers in India free access to the Practically teacher app. We also have a strong foothold in the Middle East and are rapidly expanding to cater to other markets like South East Asia. At present, over 15,00,000 students, 18,000 teachers and 350 schools have benefitted from Practically and this community continues to grow!

Awards won:
Winner at Tie50 at TieCon 2021
Best EdTech Startup of the Year - Startup Awards 2021 by Entrepreneur India magazine

The company has raised a total investment of $14M from top notch investors ahead of Series B funding.
The app is available for free on Play Store and App Store.
Visit us: https://www.practically.com/

Name: Eupheus Learning
Short Description: Eupheus Learning India's Largest School Focused Distribution Platform Offering Curricular, Supplemental and Technology Solutions to K-12.
Description:
Eupheus Learning, a brand of Proficiency Learning Solutions Private Limited, is an education and technology (edtech) company which operates with a B2B model focusing on K-12 segment. The company is positioned as the ‘Largest School Focused Distribution Platform’ in India and 1 out of 4 premium private schools use their offerings. The company offers the following solutions to their school partners:
Wide catalogue of modular differentiated curricular and supplemental content mapped to CBSE & ICSE boards.
Personalized remedial solutions for students.
New age experiential and skill building programs through our exclusive tie-ups with world’s best edtech companies.
Proprietary operating system with e-content, Learning Management System, Communications Management System, Financial Management System and ERP on a single sign-on.

Name: Premagic
Short Description: Premagic is an award-winning powerhouse built to upgrade every event organizer's organic marketing strategy.
Description:
Premagic is a B2B platform that boosts organic event marketing by encouraging attendees, speakers, and exhibitors to create content.

In a nutshell, with Premagic, you can:
- Automate sorting of Speaker/VIP/exhibitor/Attendee photos using Face recognition (eliminating manual effort for your marketing team)
- Increase ticket sales by leveraging speaker/attendee social networks through advocacy posters (reaching at least 40% relevant audience)
- Generate User-Generated Content (UGC) for your event, enhancing brand/event visibility and investing in future ticket sales
- Enhance post-event engagement with Sparks + Ripple. Have you ever struggled to associate a face with a contact card? We have. 
- Improve Sponsor Visibility and measure ROI. Many Sponsor deliverables involve logos being printed or displayed at various event spots. The only issue is: out of sight, out of mind.

Name: BuildSupply
Short Description: India’s most advanced ERP system for the real estate
Description: BuildSupply is among the leading real estate ERP and construction project management provider companies in India. It is an innovative SaaS and B2B E-Commerce platform for the construction and real estate industry. The company provides a unique system for standardization, efficiency and transparency leading to cost and time effective projects.

Name: Source.One
Short Description: Source.one is a distributor of chemicals.
Description: Source.one is a supplier of chemical products. They provide products that include fintech, chemical distribution, and b2b commerce. An online inquiry form is available on the company's website.

Name: Goldsetu
Short Description: Empowering the unorganized jewellery retailers through digital tools and access to an efficient supply chain
Description: One-stop B2B jewellery platform that helps jewellers manage and grow their jewellery business through digital tools and access to extensive collections of jewellery products.

Name: YantraLive
Short Description: YantraLive is a B2B platform for Heavy Equipment Owners.
Description: YantraLive provides industry-first solutions for the trade-in and maintenance of heavy equipment by supply the right parts and services on time while redefining the ownership experience for heavy equipment. They offer Repair Services, Onsite Fitment Service, General inspection, and many more.

Name: ForeignAdmits
Short Description: ForeignAdmits is a B2B Marketplace platform helping study abroad agents to amplify their students' admissions to post-admissions journey.
Description:
ForeignAdmits is a B2B digital platform as a service helping study abroad consultants amplify their students' admissions to post-admissions journey.  

We were founded in 2018 by two IIT Alumni & International graduates & headquartered in the Silicon Valley of India, Bengaluru. We support our partner's boast of enabling over 700+ study-abroad counseling companies in India & abroad.   

We are backed by prominent VCs (Venture Capitalists), some top SAAS Unicorn Company Founders, & trusted by over 700 Companies who are our customers. We have been entrusted by over 100 Partners globally, from top National Banks to International Lenders, Accommodation Providers, & more, who are serving over 5000 students on our platform.  

We have seen this industry from a student's Lense first. And by being in a consultant shoe for over 5 yrs. serving 20,000+ students, we were able to create systems, processes, &, finally, products that solve extremely critical problems faced by students & overseas admissions consultants. 

Around 5 yrs. before, the founders, Ashwini Jain & Nikhil Jain, saw the problems faced by study abroad aspirants in getting standardized, end-to-end, & authentic guidance in planning to study abroad. Thus, they started a mentorship service under the brand of ForeignAdmits to help students who aimed to study abroad with experiential guidance, & some tried & tested frameworks. From their own experiences of getting double scholarships in Master'smaster's & fully funded Ph.D. & experience of guiding over 5000 students from their alma maters in India, they understood the gap in awareness & the need for experiential guidance. Thus, the foundation of ForeignAdmits was laid.   

ForeignAdmits is built to bring trust, efficiency & transparency to the overseas education industry. We aim to enable study abroad consultants to provide a stellar post-admissions experience for students using our enhanced technology platform, integrated marketplace & proactive customer support.

Name: Peel-Works
Short Description: Peel-Works is a tech & data analytics company specializing in ecommerce for corner stores.
Description:
Peel-Works is a tech and data analytics company specializing in eCommerce for corner stores. Taikee is an ISO-certified, B2B grocery eCommerce platform delivering betterlives to cornerstores.
The company has a direct tie-up with leading FMCG brands, making it convenient for traditional grocery retailers to source a wide assortment at low prices through a single app, instead of interacting with salesmen of multiple brands. Taikee solves inventory management, out of stock and working capital issues for retailers by assuring next-day delivery, thus empowering them to offer their consumers a delightful shopping experience. The company is committed to providing tech-enabled solutions which aim to improve store sales and profitability for India's CornerStores.

Name: Biddano
Short Description: Biddano is a technology-driven platform for organizing the B2B healthcare supply chain.
Description:
Biddano is a healthcare supply chain platform that provides a simplified order management technology for chemists and hospitals. The company's technology simplifies and manages supply chain gaps between distributors and chemists by enabling orders from multiple distributors to be consolidated into pharmacy-specific deliveries.

Biddano was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Pune, Maharashtra.

Name: ETO Mobility Services Private Limited
Short Description: ETO is India’s leading Electric Vehicle Manufacturing and eMaaS company focusing on providing environment friendly e-mobility solutions
Description:
ETO is India’s leading Electric Vehicle Manufacturing and Electric Mobility as a Service (eMaaS) company focusing on providing
environmentally friendly electric mobility & related Energy / Charging solutions. The company is engaged in:

1. Manufacturing: Sale of EVs – India
2. Last and First Mile Services: Logistics B2B and B2C Services using EVs and Subscription/Rental services for EVs
3. Charging: Low-cost EV charging solution for e2W & e3W and captive and public charging services.

Name: Alliance Insurance Brokers
Short Description: Alliance Insurance Brokers is a strong player in B2B insurance broking company.
Description: Alliance Insurance Brokers offers motor, home, travel, group health insurance, group term insurance, group annuity, standard fire and special perils policy, residential and commercial project, burglary, housebreaking policy, and machinery breakdown policy services.

Name: PayMate
Short Description: PayMate is an Indian B2B payments fintech for Enterprise and SME across supply chains.
Description:
PayMate is a leader in B2B payments for Enterprise and SME across supply chains. The PayMate platform provides a comprehensive digital workflow tied to payments which enable greater control and transparency along with better cash flows and an end to end reconciliation for a superior experience for Enterprise and SME in closed-loop supply chains.
PayMate works with leading Visa commercial card-issuing banks to facilitate credit for both payables and receivables across supply chains moving traditional cash, cheque and EFT to card streams with several built-in risk-mitigating benefits for banks and extended days payables for buyers.
Platform features include Procure to Pay automation, credit evaluation, discount marketplace along with APIs for integration into existing accounts/ERP for minimal friction-based deployment. It is cloud-based and accessible across all form factors.
PayMate has a presence in South Asia (India) and UAE and is actively expanding across CEMEA.

Name: AllTrak
Short Description: AllTrak is B2B platform enabling your healthcare business with technology Platform and Logistics Network.
Description: AllTrak is B2B platform enabling your healthcare business with technology Platform and Logistics Network for empowering you to be competitively placed in High growth consumer Driven market.

Name: Jarsh Safety
Short Description: HaaS, Industrial Safety, B2B Hardware
Description: Jarsh Safety is changing the way we perceive safety. We are the sole designer and manufacturer of the world's 1st Air-Conditioned Safety Helmet designed for rugged industrial use.

Name: SuperZop
Short Description: SuperZop is an Agri-commerce platform for Kirana stores that is transforming the unorganized retail sector.
Description:
SuperZop is an Agri-commerce platform for Kirana stores that is transforming the unorganized retail sector with the use of disruptive technologies and process innovations. The platform also specializes in distribution, retail, technology, supply chain, B2B. It also has the goods delivered at his shop in quick time and easy to use vernacular interface the retailer can order all his grocery demands with a click of a button.

SuperZop was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India.

Name: Prolance
Short Description: Prolance is a B2B SaaS based marketplace for the interior industry.
Description: Prolance simplifies the process of executing interior projects through automation and aggregation, thus eliminating errors, cost escalations and ensuring predictability for everyone in the interior business.

Name: FreightFox
Short Description: FreightFox is a technology start-up in the Indian B2B Logistics space focussed on Manufacture Enterprises.
Description:
FreightFox is a data first enterprise transportation procurement and management system powering growth through more choices, better control and certainty in decision making for manufacturing logistics. We are complementing it with Collaborative-Logistics-as-a-Service(CLaaS) capability and creating an alternate collaborative mobility space as a first in India. Our Collaborative-Truck-Loads powered by FreightIQ will reduce cost-to-serve with lower inventory pile-ups for manufacturing enterprises.

FreightFox is disrupting the logistics for India's INR 9 L Cr. manufacturing industry through the impactful intervention of data and technology. This industry bleeds over INR 12k+ Cr. every year in revenue opportunity losses due to poor logistics.

Name: LeadSquared
Short Description: LeadSquared is a sales execution and marketing automation platform that allows businesses to track, nurture, and manage their leads.
Description:
LeadSquared is a unified lead conversion and marketing automation platform that helps B2B & B2C businesses track, nurture, and manage their leads seamlessly. It includes services like sales CRM, mobile CRM, marketing automation, integrations, and conversion platform. LeadSquared enables its clients to manage their entire database on its intuitive interface, where they can build their own custom logic. It helps increase closures and manage pipelines easily.  

LeadSquared was founded by Nilesh Patel (CEO), Prashant Singh (COO), and Sudhakar Gorti (CPO) in 2013 and is headquartered in Bengaluru, India.

Name: Datavio
Short Description: Datavio is a B2B SaaS platform offers marketplace information and optimization software to consumer companies.
Description: Datavio is a B2B SaaS platform offers marketplace information and optimization software to consumer companies.

Name: Udaan
Short Description: Udaan is a B2B trade platform that brings manufacturers, traders, retailers, and wholesalers into a single platform.
Description:
Udaan is a B2B trade platform that brings manufacturers, traders, retailers, and wholesalers into a single platform. The platform is about making business easy in India, about making B2B commerce convenient and efficient. They believe B2B is the new B2C in India. It connects retailers with wholesalers and traders who sell more than 15 lakh products ranging across categories from electronics and apparel to grocery and fresh produce.

Udaan chat feature allows users to have a personal and secure conversation in real-time, in a language of your choice. It enables a direct connection between buyers and sellers which allows one-on-one discussions to negotiate terms of trade between transacting parties. India has 50m+ SMBs, who form the core of the Indian economy and society. They are the entrepreneurial pulse of India. They believe the internet is a great equalizing platform. They want to bring their energies together in bringing the power of the Internet to these millions of entrepreneurs.

Udaan was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Bangalore, Karnataka, India.

Name: kWh Bikes
Short Description: kWh Bikes provides electric two-wheelers for B2B use cases.
Description: kWh Bikes is building the smartest, safest, and multi-utility electric scooters. The team has built a working prototype from scratch and is now engineering their production-ready scooter, which claims to be completely designed and developed in India with an in-house powertrain, something that most Indian EV OEMs are not doing.

Name: Infilect
Short Description: Infilect is a B2B SaaS company that helps global retail brands and retailers with deep visual intelligence
Description: Infilect Technologies specialises in deriving intelligence by parsing large-scale visual content such as photos and videos using proprietary deep learning and artificial intelligence technology and provide highly scalable SaaS products for the retail and advertising industries.

Name: ArisUnitern
Short Description: ArisUnitern is a B2B Real Estate firm that focuses its activities in Strategic Consulting and Investments.
Description:
ArisUnitern is a private entity headquartered in Bangalore. Established by a group of seasoned real estate professionals with 50+ years of deep industry experience across real estate development, investment, strategy etc. with leading real estate developers and financial institutions in India.

Unitern focuses its activities in Strategic Consulting and Investments. Unitern’s focus is to partner with Real Estate Companies, Land Owners and Financial institutions to ideate and implement practical ‘financial and operational’
solutions.

Unitern works with an aim to create a win-win strategy for all stakeholders involved and achieve excellence in every
aspect of our business dealings.

Name: Wefast
Short Description: Wefast provides instant same-day delivery service for B2C, B2B segment of e-commerce as well as intended for classic industries.
Description:
Wefast provides instant same-day delivery service for B2C, B2B segment of e-commerce as well as intended for classic industries. 

Wefast customers' can book urgent deliveries at no extra cost. Moreover, the company gives the opportunity for self-employed freelancers to make extra money in their spare time. The company is making a city a better place to live and support people who live in it. Students, artists and designers who are willing to make earnings without giving up their main job or studies. This is also a perfect job for people who enjoy cycling and want to keep fit as the majority of their couriers are walking or cycling. Their service is helping to reduce traffic jams and improve the environment.

Name: Pice
Short Description: Pice offers an embedded B2B payments platform.
Description: Pice is a business-to-business payment platform designed for real-time settlement and auto reconciliation of any ticket size. The company's platform provides inline payments, three-step payment checkout, and immediate transaction settlements at minimal fees, allowing companies to accept payments and complete transactions without requiring users to leave their platform.

Name: MaxWholesale
Short Description: MaxWholesale is an Online B2B grocery company.
Description:
Max Wholesale.in is India's first online B2B platform for sourcing all inventory needs for local General Store merchants.

The FMCG supply chain as they know it is in dire need of technology infusion. Less than 0.1% of retailers of India - who they identify as Kirana stores - use POS terminals. With 8 million stores, India surpasses even countries like China, and the demand that originates from these stores is highly fragmented. They are individually small but collectively very large

With their data science driven approach they are changing the way business is done at these stores. Their friends - the moms and pops at these stores - need a hint of the right technology and tools which could help them increase efficiency and return-on-effort.

At MaxWholesale, Their proprietary algorithms help you predict your demand, procure better, larger variety and more reliably, reduce wastage, and enable you with the right working capital based on your payment history.

Name: Relux Electric
Short Description: Relux Electric provides and manufactures electric vehicle charging solutions for both B2B and B2C markets.
Description: Relux Electric is a company that specializes in providing electric vehicle charging solutions. They offer services to all types of electric cars and have a network of charging stations. In addition to providing charging services, Relux Electric also manufactures electric vehicle charging stations. They cater to both B2B and B2C markets, providing home and commercial EV charging solutions. They also offer RFID technology in their services.

Name: Jumbotail
Short Description: Jumbotail is a B2B marketplace and retail platform for food and grocery shopping.
Description:
Jumbotail is an operator of an online marketplace that simplifies food and grocery shopping.

Jumbotail is a VC-funded startup building an online marketplace for food and grocery, targeted at wholesale buyers. It also operates a marketplace that connects tens of thousands of these Kirana stores with brands and traders. The company offers a whole suite of services including supply chain logistics, a mobile app for placing orders, integration with point-and-sales devices, and credit solutions to shop owners that can’t easily get a loan from banks.

They offer a wide selection of high-quality staples, homecare, packaged foods, and personal care products from all the leading brands, and staples producers. Their vision is to organize the food and grocery ecosystem in India using technology, data science, and design. They are building products, platforms, and services for the next billion people of India, who have fundamentally different needs - access, language, selection, supply chain, financial, cultural, and the like. Their market potential is huge - in the order of hundreds of billions of dollars. They have a strong core team consisting of alumni from Stanford, CMU, IIT, BITS, etc. having several years of industry experience in companies like Amazon, Flipkart, eBay, BCG, Housing, and Grofers.

They are reimagining and reengineering the food and grocery ecosystem through intelligent technology, intuitive design, and innovative business and supply chain models. They are a passionate team driven by their sense of purpose to solve critical real-world problems. Each team member will have significant ownership of key components that go into the next-generation e-commerce, supply chain, demand generation, and credit technology platforms and services that they are building.

Name: Chemarc
Short Description: Chemarc is a B2B digital platform that sells and buys chemicals for vendors.
Description: Chemarc is a B2B digital platform that sells and buys chemicals for vendors. On the platform, it automates the entire procure-to-pay and order-to-cash cycles. Chemarc organizes and optimizes "beyond the enterprise" processes, delivering unprecedented efficiency, effectiveness, and user experience while driving value creation through lower costs, increased revenues, and strong customer loyalty. Companies that use the Chemarc platform can conduct business more effectively by engaging and collaborating more effectively, optimizing processes, and utilizing data for better decision making.

Name: haeywa
Short Description: A FinTech Startup building haeywa "A petty cash payments and management platform"
Description:
DOTNOVAAI is a tech startup building haeywa - A B2B SAAS fintech platform that helps businesses to completely automate petty cash payments and management workflow. haeywa has is the first of its kind platform that has brought payments as well reconciliation in a single workflow with one tap statement generation

Using deep technology like AI, Blockchain and Digital banking platforms haeywa intends to help businesses improve their relationship with common assets, funds and how it flows in your daily transactions within an organization.

CarDekho develops entertainment, GPS tracking, weather, business and finance related, multi-media, sports, social networking, education, and travel applications. It serves the automobile, E-learning, consultancy, finance, social networking, tours and travel, health and fitness, medical, job and career, news and magazine, utility/productivity, entertainment, lifestyle, and Ecommerce industries; and IT and communication, and book and library industries.

Amit and Anurag Jain founded CarDekho in 2007. It has its headquarters in Jaipur in India.

Be Proactive, Not Reactive is our motto. Taking ADVAntage of technology and digitisation empowers us to follow our motto.

We, at AdvaRisk, have a vision of making a significant contribution to nation-building. For a fast-paced and overall economic growth of a country, a strong and stable financial system is a key. And this ideology drives us to build solutions for preventing and fighting financial frauds.

A young, dynamic & fast growing startup that we are, our track record shows we are here to transform fraud prevention and forensic analysis

# We have enabled financial institutions to recover banking exposure of worth ~Rs 7000 crores

# We are the 1st Start-up to be empanelled by the Indian Banks’ Association (IBA) to investigate frauds and to monitor large corporate portfolio of financial institutions

Everyone at AdvaRisk is proud to have #ThoughtForIndia and #MakeInIndia

Name: SpareIt
Short Description: SpareIt is digitising the supply chain ecosystem in the automotive aftermarket using technology
Description:
SpareIt is digitising the supply chain ecosystem in the automotive aftermarket. SpareIt® is empowering small and medium garages as well as suppliers in India through technology. Utilising proprietary technology, the company has built practical solutions for each stakeholder ranging from procurement, sales, logistics to credit. SpareIt®’s garages network is growing fast, and a large number of automotive brands are signing up to sell to the network.

SpareIt® has also brought distinct advantages to the EV segment. It offers trained and certified EV technicians and is already working with EV manufacturers and enablers who are using SpareIt®’s garage network to service their EVs. The SpareIt platform is about making business easy in India, about making B2B commerce convenient and efficient. It connects workshops with distributors and manufacturers who sell more than 30 lakh spares ranging across categories in the automotive aftermarket. SpareIt® has been able to tech-enable an inefficient and opaque ecosystem in the automotive aftermarket supply chain. Our solution is a SaaS + Multilingual + AI + Vernacular Voice to Text Search/Input platform. It is modular in nature which means that workshops or any other player in the ecosystem can plug and play the module that suits them the best.

Name: KrypC
Short Description: KrypC is a global technology solutions company delivering secure, enterprise grade Blockchain solutions to the Private and Public sector.
Description:
KrypC Technologies was co-founded in February 2016 by the duo of Ravi Jagannathan and Venkatraman Viravanallur. As a 33-member team consisting primarily of researchers and tech experts who are early adopters of new (payment) technology such as digital signature certifying authority, online tax filing and pre-paid mobile wallet, KrypC understands the nuts and bolts of blockchain technology. They decided to venture into this space to fill the existing gaps that are generally present when a new technology is launched in the market. In the simplest terms, KrypC is a blockchain services company. The team has created a B2B platform to ease adoption and usage of blockchain in different sectors, even as the space is evolving.

KrypC recently released KrypCore, the MVP version of their middleware platform that addresses the threads of enterprise resistance to blockchain. By using KrypCore, enterprises can create a custom-built blockchain for their needs with zero coding effort.

Showroom works on “Touch & Feel” mode of selling where its unique distribution model ensures that there is almost NO RETURN of products sold. It creates Experience Centres for its retailers which gives them the confidence to buy without any iota of doubt about product quality.

Showroom's offerings = Better Margins for Clothing Retailers + Aggressive Growth for Clothing Manufacturers

Description:
Started in July 2015 by alumni's from IIT Kanpur - Adurup is India's leading restaurant procurement platform.With a vision to create automation for procurement in F&B industry, Adurcup is making a difference by helping restaurants procure well to service the consumers. 

Adurcup aims to improve the supply chain infrastructure of F&B industry. To address the same Adurcup offers solution in two domains :

1.B2B e-commerce platform - Adurcup offers a single point procurement solution in form of a  web platform (www.adurcup.com) for standalone restaurants to shop products and services across categories ( food packaging,grocery,housekeeping materials,customized packaging ,pest control ,social wifi) and plan expenses.Clients include : Wow momo's,Devyani International,Impressario restaurants,Curefit ,Tea Halt etc.

2.Outsourcing solution - Adurcup offers three point solution for chain outlets to cater to their complete supply chain, comprising of - SOURCING, STORAGE and DISTRIBUTION through customized web dashboards having tools to manage inventory, trigger purchases and manage end-to-end supply chain.Clients include : Nazeer Hospitality , Wataburger etc

With these solutions, Adurcup today impacts more than 1 million dining out experiences , half a million food deliveries and empowers more than 500+ SME's in the value chain.

Name: afterbricks.com
Short Description: Afterbricks is an experiential commerce omni-channel platform for home improvement products both B2C & B2B2C
Description:
Owning a house is a big deal. A lot of money and emotion go into renovating or doing the interiors of a house. There are two major challenges - find the products of your choice, brand & design and to within your over all defined budget.

Afterbricks helps you create your own product collection for each space e.g. bedrooms, living Room, bathroom etc from top brands under one roof, either in collaboration with your professionals or along with family or friends from 13 categories like Electricals, Flooring, Woodwork, Bath Fitting, Modular kitchen, Hardware, Appliances, Paint & Polish, lighting, Smart home, Décor etc., that too within an an overall defined budget. 

As you create you first level assortment, Afterbricks assigns a brand experience centre/curated brand store and sets up a formal appointment before navigating your visit to the store for the product tactile experience.
Buying for home improvement is complex, but don't worry with Afterbricks we take your pain  

Next, you can 
- Compare prices online 
- Check for availability  
- Bargain for best discounts instantly from 3 auto assigned sellers powered through “Live offers” section on Afterbricks. 

Finally, with Afterbricks omni channel ecosystem you may choose to buy-directly at the brand store powered by “buy@store”  or compare price & place order “ON-LINE” to brand partners on Afterbricks. Billing & logistic by the seller.

Name: Samaaro

The platform empowers B2B companies who host or participate in events to create an amazing brand experience and generate business opportunities.

Name: Doctor Insta
Short Description: Bringing Healthcare to Everyone's fingertaps; India's 1st Video Medicine Company where One can consult Care-Givers anytime, anywhere.
Description:
We are striving to fix the current problem of Accessibility, Reliability and Consistency in India’s $100 Billion HealthCare Market and to bring Healthcare to everyone’s finger “Taps”; Anytime, Anywhere.
 
What are the current problems?
1. Patient wastes 3-4 hrs of total time (getting ready, 2X Bad Traffic, 3X Parking issues, wait-time) to see a Doctor. 
2. Patient’s current Doctor doesn’t offer “Anytime, Anywhere” access and 100% money back guarantee; Not Tech Savvy with Video/Phone/Text.
3. Patient has 20% Chance of getting new infection that he didn’t have earlier at Clinic/Hospital.
4. One procrastinates on moderate medical issues ignoring early symptoms for which one has to pay dearly later.
5. Certain Specialties (like Psychology and Sexology) have a Social Stigma and people feel uncomfortable being seen at these clinics and discussing these issues.
6. Doctors lose out on productivity because of underutilized capacity; Higher ﬁxed/variable costs to run clinics; Limited catchment Area-most patients visit from within 20 miles.

How “Doctor Insta” is solving these problems?
1. Our highly educated & trained Doctors give you the best possible advice in 15-30 mins by using our cutting edge Video Medicine Technology through Web, Android and iOS. 
2. We are available “Anytime, Anywhere” for our patients 24x7x365 and offer 100% money back guarantee thus fixing the problem of reliability and accessibility.
3. No Infection or Social Stigma for any Medical Specialty as you can consult from the privacy of your home.
4. Increased Productivity for Users and their Employers and Lower Probability of Procrastination. 
5. Triple Bottom-Line Focus with Impact on People (Better Health), Planet (Lower Carbon Footprint) & Profits.
6. Doctors can enhance capacity utilization by providing consultation on our platform. No additional cost; Easy patient discovery from all over the country; Convenience of practicing at home/clinic.
 
 Our Business Model and Management Team:
1. Unique B2C and B2B2C Models for Patients and Employers with Gross Margin as high as 70%.
2. Very Strong and Pedigreed Management and Advisory Team with past background at CXO level in different fortune 500 companies and e-commerce start-ups as well as practicing Medicine in Multi-Specialty Hospitals all over the world

Short Description: Safexpay is a B2B2B fintech focussed on platform & API infrastructure for businesses across the globe

Name: actyv.ai
Short Description: actyv.ai is a cutting-edge B2B SaaS platform with hassle-free partner onboarding, flexible BNPL options, embedded insurance and more.
Description:
Imagine a future where B2B supply chains are revolutionised through embedded finance and insurance. 

Say hello to actyv.ai, a cutting-edge B2B SaaS platform with hassle-free partner onboarding, flexible Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) options and embedded insurance. Powered by artificial intelligence, the company has introduced a game-changing solution to transform the B2B supply chain by democratising financial inclusivity and providing innovative insurance and investment products. 


The actyv.ai Offering:  
•	actyvGo - Unlock top-line growth through hassle-free digitized partner onboarding and offboarding. 
•	actyvScore - AI-driven multidimensional score to find the right business partner. 
•	actyvPayLater - Access to purpose-based BNPL payment options for distributors and retailers.  
•	actyvInsure - Bite-sized insurance options for distributors and retailers. 
•	ActvvInvest - Curated investment products, like digital gold and mutual funds, for business partners to invest surplus working capital. 

With these offerings, actyv.ai acts as a one-stop-solution for a diverse range of industries, including FMCG, pharma, energy and utilities, agriculture, infrastructure, and auto. With unique, cross-industry applicability, actyv.ai is vertical-agnostic platform, aimed at fostering seamless B2B interactions. Complete with partner onboarding, embedded finance, BuyNowPayLater options, insurance, and investment products, actyv.ai intends to stay at the forefront of digitalisation for businesses in India and across the globe. 

Co-founded by Raghunath Subramanian and Ramkumar Thirumurthi, actyv.ai offers businesses of all sizes the ability to seamlessly interact with supply chain partners and financial institutions on a single platform. This means increased efficiency, profitability, and a smooth supply chain experience from start to finish.

Name: Agricx
Short Description: Agricx is an online B2B listing platform for connecting cold storage owners with bulk buyers for potato.
Description:
Agriculture sector despite contributing 14% of the GDP is in desperate need of innovations. They help bulk buyers of agri-produce to assess the quality of their purchase accurately, economically & instantly.The area considered to be in urgent need of disruption is supply chain and market linkage. A complex & fragmented supply chain, opaque price discovery process along with inadequate forward integration, has resulted in sub-optimal quality, low price and high wastage of farm produce. In a nutshell, consumers are paying as much as 400% more than the price at which produce was sold at the farm gate.

One of the most important reason is the absence of grading. Despite the benefits associated with the grading system; it is still not practiced due to several reasons such as - High costs, nonavailability of technology and awareness amongst the stakeholders. Thus necessitating a physical assessment of produce to determine the specification & quality of the produce.

They at, Agricx strive to streamline the process, by developing the proprietary technology through which it makes it easier and relatively inexpensive to determine the quality and size of the produce and also ensure greater accessibility to produce information.

In a nutshell, At Agricxlab they are going to transform the way agriculture procurement specialist across country procures their requirements in the most efficient way with the use of technology.

It lacks transparent pricing and because of multiple supply chains agents getting involved it increases the price of the products. We automate and help businesses to procure at competitive pricing through their choice of distributors. In addition we also give them access to businesses for extended financial payment options through our financial partners. No more dealing with multiple invoices, multiple payment terms or different distributors. All procurement happens through one platform and every invoice gets financed.  

Our medication finder app for the consumers helps them to avail prescription medications at their nearest pharmacy. Don’t go in circles finding medicines and you definitely don’t have to wait for it to be delivered. Upload your prescriptions through our app or through Facebook messenger and pick it up from the nearest pharmacy within minutes at the best price. Set prescription reminders to be refilled by your local pharmacy on a regular basis at wholesale prices.

Medpick portal offers domestic & international health, wellness, fitness, beauty care products on www.medpick.in at best prices to be delivered at home or can be picked up from the local pharmacy. India’s first omni-channel health supplies portal which has pick up locations in every block of the city. ‘Buy online pick up in store’.

Every firm, whether it is an SME, a startup, or a large corporation, has difficulty selecting the right digital service vendors. With more than 1000+ transactions, Expand My Business sees nearly a 20% repeat in business. Expand My Business’ vision is to become a one-stop solution for businesses to not only find a service provider easily, but also to become the delivery partner for them.
