Short Description: Pulpit Mobility is India’s first subscription-based cab aggregator start-up for our partners and ready-to-go cab service for users.
Description:
Pulpit Mobility is India’s first subscription-based cab aggregator start-up for our partners and ready-to-go cab service for users. Pulpit Mobility is developing a single platform to bring together all Business markets. Pulpit provides cabs for all types of needs ranging from local travel, outstation travel, and rental service.

India’s first cab aggregator where every business can select a cab according to their need and choice. Once you enter the details of your trip you get a list of cabs from which you can select a cab based on the type of car, the color of the car, drivers rating, number of trips completed by driver, etc. Also, users get to ride at the lowest price possible. Where drivers and partners bid for the trip and you get to select the best deal possible for your trip. We have got you covered by offering our service for local and outstation travel as well as rental car service.

Pulpit Mobility offers service to partners at a monthly subscription plan. Whereas Pulpit does not charge any commission from partners. Partners can take as many trips as they want by paying a monthly fee. For the B2B segment. Pulpit Mobility has installed a bidding system that will make sure that both the parties involved (driver & agent/travels) get the best deal for their trip. Partners of Pulpit can take trips from anywhere in India without having fear of losing payment, as Pulpit Mobility makes sure that partners’ payment is secure with us.

Name: Jeevanksh.com
Short Description: Jeev Anksh is a one-stop organic food store based in Guwahati, India.
Description:
Jeev Anksh Eco Products is a social enterprise and is in the business of marketing healthy, organic and eco-friendly products since 2012.

The company is a DIPP, Govt. of India, recognised startup, under Startup India initiative, with recognition no. DIPP2109. The company has completed incubation with the Land Accelerator - South Asia 2020 by World Resources Institute; NeatEhub, Assam Agriculture University, Jorhat, Assam; and from ZTM & BPD unit of Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), Pusa Campus, New Delhi, with technical support from Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR), Umiam, Meghalaya.

Jeevanksh.com, the company website, was launched on 12/12/12, as an online marketplace for organic and eco-products. We deal in all kind of finished products which are certified organic. We are an Associate Member of IFOAM Organic International and IFOAM Asia. We have tie up with organic growers of Northeast India, and have access to a total farmland of over 1000 ha. under organic cultivation, in the foothills of the Himalayan mountain range of NE region, near the Indo-Bhutan borders. Our farmer friends are over 10000 in number and are mostly small and marginal tribal farmers doing organic agriculture. The company serves clients (B2B food companies) from across the country as well as from South East Asian countries. The company’s products have reached the store shelves in India, Southeast Asia, Middle East, and Europe.

The company won the first National Entrepreneurship Award (2016-17) under SC/ST Category and was awarded by the Honourable Home Minister of India, Shri Rajnath Singh ji. The award ceremony was organised by the Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship, Govt. of India.

The company provides forward market linkages to organic farmers of Northeast India, and promote and market their farm produce in India. The company has so far benefited over 10000 small and marginal tribal farmers of the region, and was instrumental in improving the income and providing sustainable livelihoods to these farmer families. The company does contract farming with buy-back agreements with the organic farmers collectives (FPC/FPOs & Farmer Groups) associated with them. The company is fortunate to be working with three Krishi Ratna awardee farmers of the region. The company’s revenue has broken even in the 2015-16 financial year.

Name: Curateus
Short Description: World's first marketplace for human-curated content, wherein verified curators recommend content on what to read, watch and listen to.
Description:
Curateus is Pinterest for content recommendations on what to read, watch and listen to via human curators. 

My grandmother explains, “We ask trusted people to find the best doctor for a prognosis – Curateus helps find the content the same way”.

Application is two-fold:
(1) B2C: Subscribers match with Curators, who recommend personalised content. Curators are handpicked based on their motivation and passion for topics & genres.
(2) C2B2B: Businesses get human-curated content for their industry for more touch points with users/clients and to upskill their employees. Also, businesses get deep insights into how their users engage with their product/service

In the future, Curateus will be extended to other use cases – eating (Food-Recommendations-as-a-Service), learning (Education-Guidance-as-a-Service) and travelling (Itinerary-as-a-Service).

Company Name: Leadgenerator.io

Overview:
Leadgenerator.io is a B2B automated lead generation platform designed to streamline the process of identifying and targeting potential customers for businesses. With its unique features, Leadgenerator.io focuses on improving the efficiency and effectiveness of sales and marketing teams.

Problem Solved:
The platform solves the problem of manual and time-consuming lead generation tasks by automating cold email and list building for B2B businesses. This involves creating purchase triggers, segmenting target audiences, writing personalized emails, and automating email sending, tracking open and click-through rates, and following up with prospects.

Key Features:

AI-powered personalization for email campaigns
Automated email cadences
Built-in CRM for contact management
Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) feature for targeted list building
Sales playbooks and training
Tasks & Projects for organization and productivity
Pitch Blocks for pre-written, professional messaging
Reports & Analytics for data-driven decision making
Tracking and Goal Tracking for productivity and focus
Key Benefits:

Improved response rates with personalized emails
Time-saving automation of manual tasks
Organized contact management
Targeted outreach to ideal customers
Streamlined sales process and training
Efficient task management and goal tracking
Enhanced sales pitch messaging
Data-driven insights for campaign optimization
Onboarding and Support:
Leadgenerator.io provides dedicated customer success support, ensuring a seamless onboarding process and ongoing assistance with using the platform effectively. The team offers training and resources to help users maximize the platform's potential and achieve their revenue goals.

Ideal Users:
The platform is designed for Sales Development Representatives (SDRs), Account Executives (AEs), and marketing professionals who want to improve their lead generation efforts and streamline their sales and marketing processes.

Trial/Demo:
While a free trial is not available due to the platform's complexity, Leadgenerator.io is happy to provide a demo showcasing its features and benefits.

Marketing Department Benefits:
Marketing teams can also take advantage of the platform's tools, such as AI-powered personalization for email campaigns, robust analytics and reporting, and a built-in CRM for efficient contact management. This helps marketing professionals reach their target audience more effectively, track campaign success, and drive conversions.

To experience the best in lead generation, request a demo with Leadgenerator.io today and unlock your business's full potential.

Name: iamneo.ai
Short Description: iamneo.ai is an Ed-Tech company that delivers learning and recruitment experience through its ML-AI powered platform.
Description:
From Coimbatore to the world was our vision when we started as Examly in 2016. The opportunity to launch a B2B edtech startup solving for IT Upskilling and skill assessment challenges at scale, was triggered by the gaps we noticed both in the University training ecosystem as well as talent onboarding in volume hiring ITeS firms. Our AI driven adaptive learning platform caters to students, Universities and Corporate L&D in all their needs of learning, upskilling, assessment and recruiting. We wanted to democratize the IT talent recruitment industry as training and acquiring talented skilled workers anywhere in the world is a borderless initiative. 

Hailing from Tier 2 colleges and towns, we observed first hand that companies do not recruit below Tier 1 quoting lack of exposure to problem solving and hands-on coding abilities. Therefore, to compete with the global talent and make one ready for absorption, it takes a lot of hands-on practice and exposure to real-world software development challenges, rather than just academic excellence. Regardless of the candidate's university credentials or geography the idea was to enable anyone to learn software development and leverage technology for talent distribution.

How we work: We work on the Dedicated Development Centre methodology where a separate team of dedicated resources headed by a team lead works for different clients.

Name: Fieldmobi
Short Description: B2B SaaS that's digitizing field teams and small businesses and connecting them to large enterprise workflows
Description:
For decades, technology has been transforming the way businesses function, setting new benchmarks when it comes to efficiency and scalability.

But while we can go on and on about what technology has done, one thing is for certain. It has left gaps.

Small businesses and frontline workers (the 99%) have been left out of digital transformation plans for decades now. Today, they remain a major roadblock to creating truly digitized value chains. They are the parts of a large enterprise's workflow that remain manual and have no transparency whatsoever.

Nothing is stopping small businesses and the working population from adopting technology if its value is clear and it's easy to use. It’s time for the next wave of digital transformation, one that extends the reach of technology from back offices of big businesses to the frontlines, and perhaps even to every connected partner, no matter how small.

That’s what we are up to at Fieldmobi. We’re focused on enabling the next evolution of ERP by digitizing the 99% and connecting them to enterprise workflows, making truly and fully connected value chains a reality.

To do this we have 3 product lines, all on the same platform, using the same app:

Fieldmobi Frontline - A direct line to the teams, resources and operations at the frontlines of your business. It can be used in isolation or connected to an existing ERP system to extend it to the field.

Fieldmobi First ERP - A stepping stone ERP system designed for undigitized businesses that have never used an ERP system. It uses Frontline to structure the master information required to set up an ERP system and comes with an AI-based ERP consultant to help with implementation.

Fieldmobi ERP Extensions - Designed for large enterprises or industry partners, these are the truly verticalizable parts of our platform, allowing organizations to create a set of customized applications, connect it to its existing ERP system and roll it out to a network of vendors, partners and customers.

We recently launched Fieldmobi Smart Notes on Product Hunt (We were the 5th Product of the Day and 10th of the Week!). Fieldmobi Smart Notes is a simple tool that any team can use. They just need to download the Fieldmobi app and create a team (just like a Whatsapp group) and the team can start sending in messages with images (that get converted to text), audio clips and Smart Tags for amounts, categories and keywords. It all gets auto-classified, geotagged, becomes searchable and can be viewed as a table, on a map or downloaded to excel as a report. (Imagine Whatsapp group chats disguised as a powerful field team management platform).

Description:
Our journey started in December 2016, when we launched PharmaHopers.com - India's FIRST of its kind online B2B Market Place Exclusive for Pharmaceutical Industry.

Main Purpose
The main purpose of PharmaHopers.com is to bring together entire Pharma Industry at one place and provide a platform to importers, exporters, manufacturers, traders, services providers, distributors, wholesalers and governmental agencies to find trade opportunities and promote their products and services online.

Products we include
Pharmaceutical Formulations (Finished Medicines)
Pharma Raw Materials (API’s / Bulk Drugs / Chemicals etc.)
Pharma Machinery and Equipment / Packaging Etc.
Laboratory / Clean Room Products
Veterinary / Feed Supplement
Ayurved / Herbal / Homeopathy Products
Allopathic Medicine/Daily Use /Food Supplements
Cosmetic/ Derma Range
C.R.O. / Regulatory Services
Services Related to Pharma Industry
Pharma PCD Franchise Services
Third Party Manufacturing/Contract Manufacturing Services /Companies
Monopoly Pharma Franchise
Hence, in short, we bring everything related to Pharma Industry under one roof and promote their Business.

Achievements
Within the initial phase of its launch, we have got a very good response from the Industry people as they find this very useful and informative for their Business. This is the reason, as of now (May 2017), 100+ Members (Pharma Buyers and Sellers) are registered and using our platform regularly for their Business. There are almost 5,000+ products are listed with our Portal. Time spent by visitors on our website is highest.

With our regular upgradation, these numbers are growing.

Highlights of our Portal
Suppliers of all Pharma Products.
Search Engine to find Suppliers of your desired product qlily.
Tentative Price of your desired Product.
Latest Technology in Pharma Industry.
Second Hand Pharma Machinery and equipments.
Services Related to Pharma Industry.
Buyers from all over the World.
Buyers with Star Ranking – for Genuine Business.
Business Enquiries. Distributors Business Opportunity. Tenders / Plicts.
Pharma Exhibitions / Conferences.
Pharma Jobs.
E – Shop – Online Shopping of Pharma Products (Coming soon).
With so much of useful information, visitors (Buyers and Suppliers) visit our website regularly for their Business.

Our Vision
We believe in free and fair Business. Our vision is to make this platform a high quality Pharma Professionals Business Networking Platform, which provides rich and useful information and ensure for genuine businesses.

PharmaHopers.com - Connecting Buyers and Suppliers Globally
Over the past few months, with the help of modern technology, we have put in our sincere and dedicated efforts to bring together thousands of buyers and suppliers (Pharmaceutical and Medical) and help them promote their businesses.


This one stop shop is the ultimate platform for buyers to source for genuine suppliers from India as well as from across the globe. Suppliers will find this online platform the ultimate place to reach out to potential customers and clients. Advertising on this platform will get them an excellent return on their investment and guaranteed long term customers.

Our Vision 2020
We are working towards finding a spot in the World's Top 10 B2B Marketplace exclusively for the Healthcare Industry.

Name: Mass EduTech
Short Description: A SaaS company built to help Teachers. We aim to make Indian Education Industry more efficient, with vision to overhaul Global Education.
Description:
At Mass Edu Tech, we've engineered a powerful Software as a Service (SAAS) product to revolutionize the way educators create question papers and practice sheets, alleviating the substantial time and effort invested in these tasks. Our solution is not just a product; it's an opportunity to enhance teaching efficiency and elevate the overall educational experience. 


Target Market: 
Our focus spans both the B2B and B2C sectors, accommodating individual teachers, school directors, and founders. Through targeted Facebook ads, we connect with educators seeking an innovative solution for seamless question paper and practice sheet creation, initiating a personalized demonstration to showcase the capabilities of our SAAS product. 


Product/Solution:
Testlo: Making Exam Paper Creation a Breeze! 

Testlo, the user-friendly platform, is changing how we create exam papers and answer keys – all in just 10 minutes! It's designed with simplicity in mind and has over 400,000 questions for classes 6th to 12th.
Let us dive into how Testlo makes the process super easy: 

1. Easy Navigation: 
          - Use a simple interface for a smooth experience. 
          - The design is made to be easy to understand and use. 
2. Choose Your Questions Easily: 
          - Teachers can pick questions based on topics. 
          - Use filters like question type, difficulty level, and Bloom tropology to find the right questions for your papers and practice sheets. 
3. Lots of Questions to Choose From: 
          - There's a huge database of 400,000+ questions for classes 6th to 12th. 
4. Instant Model Answers:  
          - With just a click, teachers can access model answers, streamlining the creation and grading of assessments. 
5. Personal Branding Header: 
          - Teachers can attach their personal branding to the question papers they create, fostering a sense of ownership and recognition. 
6. Watermarking Capability:
          - The platform enables the application of watermarks, enhancing the security and authenticity of generated materials. 
7. Custom Question Addition: 
          - Teachers have the flexibility to add their own questions, enabling them to customize materials according to their teaching style and student needs. 
8. Edit Database Questions:
          - Our platform allows teachers to modify and tailor existing questions from the database to better suit their teaching objectives. 
9. Question Reporting Feature:
          - Users can report questions, ensuring the continuous improvement and accuracy of the question bank. 


Annual Subscription Tiers: 

1. Teachers/Individual Users: 
   - Subscription Range: INR 500 to INR 5,000 
   - Empowering individual teachers with comprehensive question paper creation tools, this tier ensures a tailored solution that enhances teaching materials effortlessly. 

2. Schools/Multiple Users: 
   - Subscription Range: INR 7,000 to INR 50,000 
   - Designed for educational institutions, this tier offers a comprehensive package that caters to multiple users, including teachers, directors, and founders. It unlocks the full potential of our SAAS product, fostering collaboration and efficiency across the institution. 


Value Proposition: 
Choosing Mass Edutech means embracing a transformative tool that not only saves time and effort but also empowers educators to prioritize what matters most – delivering quality education. Our competitive pricing ensures accessibility for individual teachers while providing robust solutions for entire educational institutions. 


Projected Growth: 
As Mass Edutech, we anticipate substantial growth in an ever-expanding market with an increasing reliance on technology in education. Our revenue model extends beyond selling a product; it contributes to the evolution of teaching practices, making education more effective and enjoyable for educators and students alike.


Company Funding Journey:
Mass Edu Tech commenced its journey with a seed capital investment of 2.5 Lakh INR, providing the foundation for our six-month developmental phase. December 2023 marked a turning point as Testlo, our flagship product, transitioned from a free MVP offering to a Freemium model. In this short period from December 3rd to December 29th, Testlo gained 239 paying clients, generating INR 3,10,521/- in revenue.
 
This capital infusion will drive the scaling of operations, expansion of our SAAS product's reach, and enhancement of its features. With confidence in our vision, Mass Edu Tech is excited about the positive impact we'll continue to make in the realm of educational technology.

Name: AVANI
Short Description: Sustaining rural lifestyles by creating conservation-based livelihood opportunities.
Description:
Avani produces eco friendly textiles, natural dyes and colors. We are an artisan`s collective purchasing raw material from local farmers to produce contemporary, natural textiles and colors for world markets. Our decentralized production model brings work to the artisans` homesteads, obviating the need to migrate for work. Avani`s production processes are non-polluting and sustainable meeting the global trends and environmental regulations in contrast to the current highly polluting textile and colorants industries.

Avani`s business will have two streams of customers, B2C and B2B. For B2C we are looking at building and selling through retailers, direct exhibitions and franchises. We target discerning consumers who have the capacity to pay for high-quality products and care about the environmental, ethical and health impacts of production processes. These include urban affluent women, professional and hobby dyers, schools and parents concerned about toxic chemical dyes. We plan to set up one flagship store to showcase the brand. For the B2B customers, we are looking at small and medium craft enterprises and industrial manufacturers, both in textiles and cosmetics.

We create sustainable rural employment by preserving traditional skills and conserving natural resources in Kumaon Himalayas. Our model supports rural lifestyles and strengthens local economies, thereby providing local women and youth with a choice to stay in their beautiful villages.

Name: Xebra

Name: GrowthSpree

Description:
GrowthSpree works as an extended marketing team for early stage B2B SaaS companies. We help B2B SaaS brands draw the first MRR. And multiply that MRR with our demand frameworks, cutting the usual learning curve they would go through, thus saving them costs, and more importantly, time.


We have helped some of the most enviable brands including Rocketlane, Toplyne, Gumlet, Limechat, Hasura, and Cleartax to scale demand without scaling their teams.


There are 4 tenets to the GTM strategy of an early-stage SaaS:

1. Multichannel cold outreach for customer discovery; that can validate the value prop and narrative and find a PMF or the lack of it.

2. A robust and scalable marketing and sales infrastructure that tracks every effort for faster iterations on GTM experiments

3. Strong framework to build the organic funnel through a content-driven strategy, for sustainable growth beyond initial momentum.

4. Retention of users for long term growth.


That feeds into the GrowthSpree way of working - Our core services include:

1. Marketing and Sales Ops

2. Account Based Marketing for customer discovery and market development

3. Performance Marketing

4. Nurturing/Retention of users

5.Revenue Ops


Why work with us?

The top reasons include:

1. Cut down on the learning curve

2. Arrive at a channel-message fit

3. Cross-pollination of ideas from multiple SaaS brands

4. Deep functional and vertical expertise in B2B SaaS

5. And save some money on the way


An in-house demand team will cost you anywhere between $200k-$500k for hiring, training costs and salaries. 
We come with years of training, benchmarks, experiments from Day 0 at 20% of the cost.

Description:
The Company:
EV-Plus is a technology company, founded in January 2010 with the goal of researching, developing and commercializing applications in the field of artificial intelligence for the online gaming industry.

Company Mission Statement: 
EV-Plus main goal is becoming a world leading online social gaming company.

The Team:
* Alex Frenkel, Co-Founder, CEO. Holds BA and MA in Clinical Physiology. Expert on game theory and social media. 
* Eric Shellef, Co-Founder, CTO. Holds B.Sc. in Electrical and Computer Engineering and Holds PhD from the Weizmann institute in Mathematics. Algorithm development specialist.
* Kobi Ben-Tzvi, VP R&D. Seasoned R&D expert with over 10 years experience leading development teams at large companies and start-ups.
* Itai Yaskil, Product Marketing with over 9 years experience in leading companies, Texas Hold`em expert.

The Products:
The first product released May 2010 includes a client software and social website a. Its main goal is to give poker players on Facebook (Zynga poker - the largest poker room on facebook) a better playing experience by getting feedback while they play. Further development includes an original Facebook game and add-ons for other popular social games.

The Technology:
For over two years the founders have been developing mathematic algorithms resulting in a strong Texas Hold`em Artificial Intelligence (AI). 
The AIâ€:tm:s uniqueness is its breakthrough opponent modelling component using real-time Nash Equilibrium calculations. 
Ability to integrate with existing social games and provide major added value to the players.

The Business Model:
* Micro-Payments - Users will buy packages of credit. Similar to the Zyngaâ€:tm:s virtual currency model.
* B2B â€“ cooperation with social games companies (Zynga, Playdom, Crowdstar, Playfish and others) in a rev-share model.

Short Description: Facilitating over 1000 retail businesses in India, Middle East & Africa, Peddle Plus provides retail solutions for B2B, B2C & D2C brands.
Description:
Peddle Plus is a 360° Retail Solution made by Retailers, for Retailers! 

Our billing software/ERP is a simple & affordable solution for GST Billing, Invoicing, Accounting, Inventory Management and Data Reports. In addition, our Ecommerce solution for B2C, B2B and D2C retailers helps them take their business online without any hassle in just 20 days.

GST/VAT Billing
Inventory Management
Accounting Control
Point Of Sale
Sales & Purchase
CRM System
Stock Transfer
Data Reports
*Can be connected to your online store

E-commerce Solution:
Peddle Plus Ecommerce Website Builder helps you to effortlessly create your ecommerce website and mobile app. You also integrate your store with ERP, CRM, POS, and Inventory Management modules. If you are a small to medium retailer, you can start selling online through the Peddle Plus platform (web & app).

Peddle Plus retail software benefits:
1) Get all retail solutions in a single software
2) Get priority tech support
3) Easy to learn and use
4) Monitor your business from multiple devices
5) Multi-user/multi-store feature available
6) Real-time reports for better business decisions
7) Integrate aggregator platforms like Amazon, Zomato & Swiggy
8) Integrate with third-party apps such as RazorPay, WhatsApp Marketing, SMS, credit/debit card,Unified Payment Interface (UPI), logistic partners, marketing apps and more

Why choose Peddle Plus:

1. Increase your Sales by 30% – Our E-Commerce Offline to Online technology helps connect your store to your local and global customers. This helps retailers increase their customers which further increases their revenue.

2. Improve relations with your supplier – With the Peddle Plus ERP, manage your payments and pay your suppliers on time to maintain a good relationship with them.

3. Analyze your retailing – With the Peddle Plus dashboard, analyze your retailing in a graphical format to understand your sales, profits and overall growth.

4. Employee Satisfaction – Satisfy and retain employees with our integrated commission management system. Use Peddle Plus Reporting to see which employee made the most sales.

5. Stay Compliant and Unified – With the Peddle Plus ERP system, you can manage your offline or online sales with a single inventory. Retailers can save time profoundly with our automated and unified inventory management. 

6. Engage your customer– Keep your customers happy and engaged with our in-built CRM module. Send messages and E-Mails to your customers to keep them updated with your promotions.

7. Retain and Attract New Customers – With our integrated scheme and offer management, retain existing customers by making them a member and attract new customers by setting up new schemes and offers.

8. Manage Remotely – Connect to your multiple retail outlets remotely while away on vacation and keep a check on your retailing without any effort.

9. Get Your Store – Get an E-Commerce store customised for your brand and start selling online.

10. Banking made easy – With our integration technology, get your payments sent directly to your bank account and receive a notification on your phone once the payment is received.

11. Calculate your daily profit – With the Peddle Plus reporting system, you can calculate the profit earned between custom dates.

12. Secure your Data – All your data is backed up instantly and automatically with our integrated cloud technology.

13. Know the value of your assets – With our convenient item master and reports, manage and maintain all fixed assets, current stock and services to know the total worth of our retail outlets.

14. Keep a systematic record – With our omnichannel solution, keep a well-maintained and systematic record of your customers, inventory, sales, expenses, accounting, banking and reporting.

So we picked up everything we worked on and shifted to the B2B industry. A complete 180 from our initial vision. This was both frightening and challenging as a young entrepreneur. With just one employee, I started this venture. 

After tremendous trial and error, I landed in the services business, and I wanted to be the middle man for multiple different services that are hard to come by and are ridiculously expensive. Being a start-up myself, I could never find services in my budget and any leniency or understanding. 

So now here we are, 

To give you a summary of who we are and what we do, let me say we are a community that helps companies start, develop and scale. We tailor each plan and strategy individually to make sure it fits your budget and vision. Creating a single point of contact for your business and not running around and juggle multiple agencies. 

As of now, these are the services we provide;

App Development
Website Development
SEO
Content Writing
Social Media Content
Production (videography, photography and editing)
Modelling
Graphic Designing
Influencer Marketing
Keep in mind, these are a wide variety of services; some are applicable for businesses, and some apply directly to customers, so in a way, we got to accomplish our B2C dream in time and come full circle.

GreatBuyz offers other large pull marketing tools to consumers – It is a Coupons/Offers and Gift cards aggregator that aggregates thousands of coupons, deals from multiple sources and makes them available to users in one location. It caters to Online, Offline (O2O) and Omni-channel Businesses.

GreatBuyz is your ticket to be a smart shopper. It helps you not just save time and money, but to get the best value for what you buy without investing too much time on it. It is like a magic genie that brings together the best deals, coupons and discounts under one roof through its multi-layer offering. 

It’s unique Permission Driven feature called “Streamz” allows you to Follow and Unfollow your favourite brands and stay in touch with them without having to sift through junk email and SMSes, basically you are free of any unwanted marketing messages.

It gives you updates on latest seasonal and flash sales and offers and deals running across various categories like food, apparel, health, beauty and home. One can choose to Opt-in for the information and stay connected with your preferred brands, get to know them better and engage in them in a healthy and non-intrusive manner.

Being need specific, Opting out of the updates is just as easy. After all, the aim of GreatBuyz is to make shopping easy and enjoyable

Name: YarnLIVE
Short Description: YarnLIVE is a B2B eCommerce platform for spinning mills to sell yarn to weavers, knitters and other yarn buyers.
Description:
Yarn Market on Mobile! Buying yarn and cotton at the best price has never been so easy. YarnLIVE is a first of its kind app for the textile industry of India.

If you are a textiles professional, below are plenty of reasons why you must have the YarnLIVE app installed on your mobile at all times:

1) The product range of all spinning mills of India, their latest real-time yarn rates (in INR 
and USD) and their contact details.

2) The beautiful and professional user interface (UI & UX) and design of the app makes it very user-friendly. You won't find any difficulties in finding the current yarn rates or the contact details of mills.

3) You can contact mills directly through phone, email or whatsapp. Alternatively, you can submit your yarn requirements in the "My Requirements" section of the app. We will send your requirements to all the mills listed on the app and all those mills that are interested in selling yarn to you will contact you directly.

4) The app is currently allowing only spinning mills of India to display their yarn products and prices. For all yarn importers outside India, you will find a separate section called "Import Yarn from India". In this section, you will find all those mills listing their products that are interested in exports. They publish their yarn prices in USD, their export payment terms and the port they export from.

5) Yarn LIVE has integrated WhatsApp within the app. With one tap, you can launch a WhatsApp chat with the mill or direct mill agents.

6) Don't want to buy yarn from mills? No problem. You will also find every detail of more than 150 direct mill agents on the app. You can find specific agents for the type of yarn you need or the city you want delivery in. Their contact details are openly available on the app itself.

7) In addition to yarn, you will also find a separate section for cotton. In this section, Ginners located in India add the variety of cotton they manufacture and quote their prices per candy. Just as we have for mills, the contact details of ginners are also openly available on the app itself. Feel free to contact the ginners to purchase cotton bales from them.

8) In addition to cotton and yarn, you will also find a separate section for Looms on Job Work on the Yarn LIVE app. In this section, you will find a city-wise distribution of looms that are available for job work. If you want yarn to be converted to textiles, you can contact your nearest job worker immediately.

MISSION of YarnLIVE:

Yarn LIVE aims to give yarn mills a platform to find new buyers and yarn buyers a platform for easy and transparent access to yarn at best prices from mills.

FuelCab India is a B2B ecommerce platform that provides a wide range of green fuels and bio raw materials to businesses across the country. With a focus on sustainability and environmental responsibility, the platform offers a convenient and efficient way for companies to access the products they need for their operations.

One of the major advantages of using FuelCab India is its ability to provide doorstep delivery of the fuels & raw materials. This eliminates the need for companies to spend time and resources on transportation, allowing them to focus on their core business activities. Additionally, the platform offers a wide range of products, including biofuels, bio-raw materials, and green fuels, which allows businesses to find the products that best suit their specific needs.

The platform also offers a user-friendly interface, making it easy for businesses to navigate and find the products they need. Additionally, the platform provides detailed product information, including specifications, prices, and availability, which allows businesses to make informed purchasing decisions.

FuelCab India is also committed to providing high-quality products that meet the needs of its customers. The platform works with a network of trusted suppliers and manufacturers, ensuring that the products it offers are of the highest quality. Additionally, the platform regularly reviews and updates its product offerings to ensure that they are in line with the latest industry trends and developments.

In addition to its wide range of products and doorstep delivery service, FuelCab India also offers a variety of payment options, including online payments, credit card payments, and bank transfers. This allows businesses to choose the payment option that best suits their needs and preferences.

Market Analysis

Local market online / find connection near you / discover deals and product near you or in your local market from home / compare and take action.

First it give option to compare in their local marketplace and get feedback from the other user of products or review stores or services before taking any action. Specially in India where majority of web user research a product online the go to local store and buy them, thus listing of all local store in the same segment will provide good research.
User can share / chat / order online with cash on delivery /follow local store and get updates on offers.

Why Bizbol ? For Brand & Channel Partners:
By listing their product and services, associate local stores can easy add their products on it's online store , so the Brand product get more exposure and deeper penetration and feedback received from end user help them directly connect with end customer.
Why NOW ?
For small Retail business Its like security against emerging big boys.

To form a simple and efficient chain; Manufacturer/ Brand to Retailers/shopkeeper to end customer. We target Small and local business empowering them to compete with the big player to sell , promote , generate leads / generate discount coupons / CRM services ( to push eDM / sms) ; all and many more from a single online platform which acts like a landing page, an inbound link to inform ,updates,induce a call for action,greater ROI for, Brand and their associated Store owner.
Resulting 1) always flow of new content, 2) easily channeled and moving forward and 3) having geo tagged message so the response and conversion become greater.
3) End user informed about new product and services and now where to find them local.

Description:
Welcome to Vayuyaan. We Are Glad And Grateful That You Are Here.
VAYUYAAN is the Hindi word for Airplane or gadget that can fly. At first, we were dealing in drone parts only, but our customers started demanding other electronic components for their electronics projects after experiencing our best service. This is how Vayuyaan became the first choice for electronics & robotics components like Arduino development boards, Sensors, Drone accessories, electronic DIY project parts, Internet of Things Iot based products, Thermal Printer etc..!!

In the past few years, we have seen amazing growth in Vayuyaan just because of our customer-centric vision and dedication towards a better customer experience.

We understand after covid, prices of electronic modules increased gradually; still, we try our best to make all electronic components available at a very affordable price for our valued customer. After comparing prices on other platforms, thousands of buyers place the order online on vayuyaan.com because we focus on customer retention.

Vayuyaan is committed to providing the best quality, genuine components with the least counterfeit risk at a very competitive price.
Suppose you are looking for B2B shopping of electronic components. In that case, we are always ready to support you to get the required products available through our network of different vendors and contacts.

Most of the electronic engineering projects get finalized at the last moment, and students ask for fast delivery; hence we deliver products all over India at your doorstep through trusted courier services like Delhivery, Ekart, Ecom express, Bluedart. If your pin code is not serviceable, there is no need to worry, and we will send your order through “India Post”.

Vayuyaan brings exclusive electronics sales/offers on several occasions to reward being our happy customer.
You can follow vayuyaan on social media to get updated about upcoming offers/sales and new product launches.

Vayuyaan welcomes your feedback, questions, suggestions regarding our products and services. If you have any complaint with our service, product or anything you did not like, please feel free to contact us on our customer care number available on the home page of our website.
If you need any information or for technical assistance with your projects or idea, please write us at info@vayuyaan.com


Happy shopping
Vayuyaan - let's fly together

From https://vayuyaan.com/

Name: Mudboxx Research
Short Description: Mudboxx Research is a research company that navigates numerous research engagements across diverse sectors
Description:
Mudboxx Research emerged from the collective expertise of young professionals in the market research industry. With a focus on innovation and excellence, our team brings a wealth of experience to the table, having successfully navigated numerous research engagements across diverse sectors.

Our core strength lies in providing comprehensive access to a vast network of global survey respondents across B2B, Healthcare, and Consumer domains. This extensive reach, coupled with our unwavering commitment to exceptional customer service, positions us as a trusted partner for clients spanning various industries.

Central to our ethos is a dedication to challenging the status quo. We prioritize active engagement with our clients, adopting a consultative approach to project management. By thoroughly understanding both the explicit and implicit survey requirements, we ensure that our deliverables not only meet but exceed expectations. Our steadfast refusal to undertake projects unless we can surpass industry standards underscores our commitment to excellence.

The expertise of our team extends across all facets of research i.e. consultation, survey design, survey programing and data interpretation. We leverage innovative technologies and industry best practices to deliver high-quality, actionable insights. Our communication strategies are tailored to the preferences of our clients, ensuring seamless collaboration and clarity throughout the research process.

Description:
PulsAero is a creative communication agency with a vision to help businesses of all sizes transform into a brand that delivers what the consumers need and expect. With an authentic, transparent, and unique approach, our quirky talent force comes together to create distinct verbal and visual realities that are most relevant for a brand in today’s times.

A harmony between logic, creativity, and communication lies at the heart of PulsAero. This is not only our core philosophy but also the strategy that drives our talent in the direction of your brand and its people. In the unprecedented times when consumer mindset is changing, lifestyle is transforming, technology is evolving, there is immense pressure on businesses to rethink, reinvent and readjust. We integrate our trio into all your branding and brand marketing efforts to empower and retain your existing customers while attracting prospects. It all begins with out-of-the-box thinking, humanized communication, and personalized experiences for your target audience.

1. Branding: 
It is a one-off opportunity to build your brand personality, story, and promise for your audience. It determines the people you serve, how you make them feel, and how you deliver across all touchpoints. PulsAero, as a creative communication agency, offers one-of-its-kind SIIL services that help your business transform into a customer-favorite brand. We create a comprehensive brand strategy, identity, and launch solutions that are cohesive, scalable, and flexible in both the worlds — online and offline. More importantly, we ensure every public appearance your brand makes is welcomed and loved by your target audience and customers.

a. Strategy:
Many businesses across the world place foot in the marketplace without a clear brand strategy. Lack of vision, vague understanding of the consumer, focus only on customer acquisition, and growth pressures are a few of the major reasons behind the challenges. PulsAero introduces a unique concept of building a compelling brand strategy using Black Panther’s hunting strategy that shows the rarest attributes of unbreakable focus, powerful instincts, and piercing awareness. We won’t reveal more here as we ardently want you to explore the concept on our website!

b. Identity:
Are you sure your business doesn’t need a new brand identity system? Is your decision based on facts and figures? Whether you are starting a start-up or moving into the next decade of your business, there are three scenarios that signal companies to get ready for a new brand identity. It’s when your brand outgrows, when the industry outgrows or when the brand’s value declines amongst your customers. PulsAero creative agency designs brand identity systems that are easily recognizable, recallable, and reminiscent of Peacock’s identity. Using the concept we ensure your brand establishes a lasting connection with your audience.

c. Interface:
Big names including Airbnb, Apple, Google, Mint, and Uber owe much of their success to their user-focused design approach. Despite operating in the same domain, many businesses fail to deliver a great user experience to their audience. Ignoring user experience testing, unclear user journeys, and non-inclusive UI UX design are a few causes behind it. Hence gaining insights from Spider’s intrinsic spinning capabilities, we develop intuitive and user-centric interfaces to help your brand thrive in the digital world. Plus, we offer Webflow website design and development services as Webflow is headed to become the future of websites!

d. Launch:
Launching a brand or product without identifying the right target audience and understanding consumer behavior altogether results in failed launch campaigns. Companies commit such mistakes as there is a lack of a powerful brand launch strategy, wrong brand positioning, and unclear brand messaging. But Horse can help you win the race! We learn from the animal’s capability to endure unforeseen hurdles, gain momentum and win the competition in the market.

2. Brand Marketing:
It is a continuous effort of keeping up with the promise you made, regularly. It ensures you are striking harmonious chords with people’s passion. Brand marketing goes way beyond in reaching your target audience in building meaningful relationships. It is unlike direct marketing done by internet marketing services to achieve short-term sales goals. We do not help companies do ‘business as usual.’ Instead, we unlock your brand superpower by applying ‘alternate reality’  that a marketing genius loves!

a. Brand Management:
Your business is facing a brand management problem. It needs to connect with the customers on a deeper, more emotional level. However, poor understanding of your consumer, lack of empathy, unreal celebrity endorsements among other factors forms the roadblock. At PulsAero, we apply a new system that helps you in enhancing your brand awareness and ultimately increasing brand loyalty.

b. Content Marketing:
No matter the size, many companies fail to generate leads despite putting the best efforts into content creation and content distribution. A lot of factors including lack of human-focused content, long-term thinking, clarity, consistency, and extra focus on creating viral content prove to be the barriers. We solve your problem by focusing on the driving factors and move ahead with a content marketing strategy that is structured, organized, consistent with a systematic execution. We don’t stop here! We measure the performance and optimize the efforts respectively.

c. Social Media Marketing:
A truckload of content is published on social media. Yet your brand engagement remains low. It indicates the need to develop an authentic social media strategy. It calls for detailed research to understand your audience, to take a platform-specific approach, and be consistent in the execution. PulsAero offers channel-specific social media marketing services that focus on cohesive, transparent, and authentic brand messaging. It not just accelerates brand engagement but also results in B2B and B2C lead generation. Last but not least, we conduct social media monitoring which is key to determining future strategy.

d. Ad Campaign Management:
Many companies keep rolling out an infinite number of advertising campaigns without an in-depth study of the target audience. Their efforts are focused on acquiring customers rather than taking care of the existing customers. Traditional marketing methods, lack of optimization, and the absence of a test-and-learn mindset leads to poor performance of the advertising campaigns. We help brands embrace the all-new loyalty ladder concept of the marketing legend Marty Neumeier that first pays attention to empowering the existing customers. This not only helps your brand in creating the deepest level of emotional attachment but also makes customer acquisition more budget-friendly and efficient. We begin with the end goal in mind. We identify the budget, choose the right platform for launch, optimize the finances — and continue monitoring the performance.

Name: Evolve Foundation
Short Description: A social enterprise producing plantable stationery & working towards creating smart, sustainable villages.
Description: Evolve Foundation as a social enterprise started in 2016 and is based in Dehradun, Uttarakhand. It began with an aim to create Smart-sustainable villages. Evolve deals with b2b business of plantable stationery like plantable pen, pencils & seed paper. 70% of natural/human resources are already available in a rural area, but there are problems of migration, low-income generation, no skill development, etc. faced by the villagers.  Evolve targets these challenges along with healthcare facility, education & socio-economic development. The whole production process takes place in Uttarakhand villages. Evolve supports a complete village family by buying organic seeds from the farmers, employing women for making the product and later, earned revenue is used for educating the children through Rural Shiksha programs & library set-up. Each product has the name of the farmer who makes it, therefore giving social recognization to them. Also, the products are 100% eco-friendly & leave zero-waste, which keeps the environment safe.
